name: Harvest the Sun
description:
Created for Ludum Dare 52.

Harvest helium by flying close to the sun's surface or the orbs of helium that come flying up. Complete the mission by returning to the control ship and slowing to below 10 speed.

Controls

Increase/Decrease Speed - Up/Down Arrow, Right Stick Up/Down

Roll - Left/Right Arrow, Right Stick Left/Right

Pitch - W/S, Left Stick Up/Down

Yaw - A/D, Left Stick Left/Right
